title: Ryan Block
text: Hello! I am a Ph.D. student in the Department of Political Science at Rice University. I study comparative politics, with a focus on mass political partisanship and political parties in Western democracies.

title: Research
text: Peterson, Erik, Shannon C. McGregor, and Ryan Block. “Covering Election Denial: Local Journalists in the 2022 Midterms.” [working paper]
